Name: Raspberry Mocha'tini
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Sweet chocolate and raspberry tempered by dry coffee and vodka.
History: Discovered in 2002 at Lot 61, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Raspberry Mocha'tini contains 256 calories
